sentences.en: All the paints are odorous, but we will try our best to reduce the odor.
sentences.cn: 油漆都是有气味的, 但我们会尽可能的降低油漆的气味.

sentences.en: Any odorous stockpiled material left in excess of two days shall be covered with tarpaulin sheets.
sentences.cn: 任何带有难闻气味的堆存物料,堆存多于2天,必须以防水帆布盖好.

sentences.en: Never had they noticed the roses so vivid, the willow - herb so meadow - sweet so odorous and pervading.
sentences.cn: 他们从没见过这样鲜艳的玫瑰, 这样丰茂的柳兰,这样芳香诱人的绣线菊.

sentences.en: Odorous pollutants can cause minor annoyance.
sentences.cn: 臭气污染物可以引起不严重的厌烦.

sentences.en: Storage : Clean, dry, at ambient temperature, away from odorous materials. open bags must be properly re - sealed.
sentences.cn: 保存方法: 清洁 、 干燥 、 室温下, 远离有异味材料.

words.tran_cn: 臭的，散发气味的；芬芳的
洒香水于；给…添味，给…加臭味
